author: jvanzyl
msg: o Apply patch by Henning Schmiedehausen <hps@intermeta.de> for Torque
property names in maven (at least up to b9, don't know about b10) must
not contain "-". The torque plugin unfortunately contains two of these
which are promptly interpreted by jelly as xxxx.foo - bar.yyy instead
